Container.Name: mustarrd
Container.Overview: Mustarrd is an IPTV catchup direct downloader for Xtream Codes providers. Browse EPG history, queue catchup downloads, schedule future recording downloads, remove commercials, and save files for media player apps.
Container.DonateText: If you appreciate my work, then please consider buying me a beer :D
